channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parking obstructing drive entrance, 7th April
item.description:
New flats built backing onto Hereford Place are causing people to park in a way that obstructs the entrance to Hereford Place. There is no way an emergency vehicle could get into the drive as you have to drive over the pavement now to get in to the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Hereford Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highway obstructed by posts in the carriageway surface., 7th April
item.description:
The highway (public road) has been obstructed by posts driven in to the carriageway surface at a gate, obstructing it to all but able-bodied pedestrians. GCC - Please confirm if you have authorised this obstruction or not.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Dangerously large piece of wood needs moving

item.title: Litter on slip road, 6th April
item.description:
Considerable build up on the south bound slip road off the M5 onto the A4019. Seems worse on the off-side side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 WITHYBRIDGE, Boddington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road 40102240 illegally closed, 6th April
item.description:
This road has been closed off by a large padlock and chain on the gate at this point under the tree with a fence across the rest of the field. There is also an erroneous sign stating that the permissive footpath has been closed. This is neither permissive, nor a footpath and there is no discernible reason why it should be closed e.g. damage to the surface.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junk, 6th April
item.description:
A number of items including a mattress have been dumped in the ditch
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Fiddington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Septic tank, 4th April
item.description:

item.title: Tyres dumped, 4th April
item.description:
In the ditch on the Winchcombe side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bothy Rushley Lane, Winchcombe

item.title: The public highway has been obstructed., 3rd April
item.description:
The public highway (class 5 road - USRN 40102240) has been obstructed with a locked field gate at Greenfields Farm. The gate has been reinforced with barbed wire and an historical equestrian gate located next to it also appears to have been removed, obstructing all public use.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 3rd April
item.description:
Obscured vision on the bridge coming out of kate lane turning left onto Southam lane. Hedgerow needs cutting back turning right onto Southam lane also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Nest Southam Lane, Southam
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked PROW, 2nd April
item.description:
Gloucestershire Way footpath blocked with a locked and barb-wired gate. Signs erected saying permissive paths closed. Footpath is not a permissive footpath.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Morrisons to the pinch point in Caernarvon Road, 2nd April
item.description:
The potholes in the road from Morrisons, past Salisbury Avenue, to the pinch point in Caernarvon Road is littered with potholes which makes driving dangerous as cars slow down to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 70 Canterbury Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
